name: Between life and death (LeaveLess)
description:
This is my game for the Blackthornprod Game Jam.

in this game you have to run through Autogerated Levels. you will have to kill enemys and dodge there spells to complete the Game.

How does it fit the there?

if you come the the end of a Level the healthpoints you still have left will become gold so you can buy upgrade your abilitys. so less health is more gold.
